title: (x) Materici - Egiziano Black {BJ}
content:
Hello   
This looks kind of like Giza but not quite.   
Any ideas?   
   
Thanks,   
   
Troy ![type sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141323im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20849.jpg)
author: dctroy

comments.content: It's weird. It looks like a perfect match, except, in Troy's scan, it looks like the serifs are slightly bracketed. Could it be the scan? Or maybe the outlines were modified?

The serifs ARE bracketed.   
I will post another scan that shows an enlargement.   
   
Thanks,   
   
Troy

Here is a larger scan of one character.   
Any help would be appreciated.   
   
Troy   
 ![type](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141323im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20911.jpg)
Your scan should match Egiziano Black from Agfa/Monotype. it was digitized in 1989 as part of the Typographer series.
